summary: This bill, the Eliminating Needless Administrative Barriers Lessening Efficiency for Conservation Act of 2025 (or ENABLE Conservation Act of 2025), amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to modify the conservation reserve program. Specifically, it addresses the State Acres for Wildlife Enhancement initiative and acreage limitations related to the program. The bill aims to streamline and improve efficiency of the conservation efforts under the Food Security Act by adjusting current guidelines.
